mapper.insert: INSERT INTO chat_space (user_id, c_space_name, c_space_image, c_space_date, genre) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{cSpaceName}, #{cSpaceImage}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d'), #{genre} )
INSERT INTO chat_enter (chat_space_no, user_id, chat_enter_date) VALUES ( #{chatSpaceNo}, #{userId}, DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i'))
mapper.select: SELECT chat_enter_no, chat_space_no, U.user_id, user_image, chat_enter_date, nickname FROM chat_enter CE JOIN user U ON CE.user_id = U.user_id WHERE chat_space_no = #{chatSpaceNo}
